ARABIC: وَزَكَرِيَّآ إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥ رَبِّ لَا تَذَرْنِى فَرْدًا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلْوَٰرِثِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And Zakariyya when he called out to his Lord, 'My Lord, do not leave me on my own, though You are the Best of Inheritors.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (Remember) Zachariah when he called to his Lord: "Do not leave me alone (and childless), for you are the best of givers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And We bestowed favour upon Zechariah, when he cried to his Lord: "Lord! Leave me not solitary (without any issue). You are the Best Inheritor."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Zachariah prayed, "Lord, do not leave me alone without offspring, although you are the best heir".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And remember Zakaria, when he prayed to his Lord, “O my Lord – do not leave me alone, and You are the Best Inheritor.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And (remember) Zakariyya, when he cried to his Lord: "O My Lord! Leave me not single (childless), though You are the Best of the inheritors."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Zakariya, when he cried to his Lord: O my Lord leave me not alone; and Thou art the best of inheritors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And Zachariah -- when he called unto his Lord, 'O my Lord, leave me not solitary; though Thou art the best of inheritors.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And Zachariah, when he cried unto his Lord: My Lord! Leave me not childless, though Thou art the Best of inheritors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Remember Zachariah, when he called out to his Lord, "Do not leave me heirless Lord, You are the best of heirs."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And Zakariyya! recall what time he cried unto his Lord: my Lord! leave me not solitary, though Thou art the best of heirs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And [remember] Zechariah, when he cried out to his Lord, ‘My Lord! Do not leave me without an heir, and You are the best of inheritors.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And (remember) Zakariya, when he cried to his Lord: "O my Lord! leave me not without offspring, though thou art the best of inheritors."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And (remember) Zakariya (Zachariah), when he cried to his Lord: "O My Lord! Leave me not single (childless), though You are the Best of the inheritors."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And Zachariah when he called to his Lord saying: 'Lord, do not let me remain by myself; You are the Best of inheritors'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And Zechariah, when he called out to his Lord, “My Lord, do not leave me alone, even though you are the Best of heirs.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [mention] Zechariah, when he called to his Lord, "My Lord, do not leave me alone [with no heir], while you are the best of inheritors."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:89] And, mention, Zachariah (Zakariyyā, is substituted by [the following, idh nādā rabbahu …]) when he cried out to his Lord, saying: ‘My Lord, do not leave me without an heir, without a son to inherit from me, and You are the best of inheritors’, the One that endures after all of your creation has perished.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And Zachariah) and mention, Muhammad, Zachariah, (when he cried unto) when he prayed to (his Lord: My Lord! Leave me not childless) alone without any helper, (though Thou art the best of inheritors) though You are the best of helpers.
